changeSet.author: Abhijeet.Hambir
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [DOFR].[GetAidCodeMapping] @FacilityId int AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT [AidCode],[Type] FROM [DOFR].[AidCodeMapping] Where [FacilityId]= @FacilityId END
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON [DOFR].[GetAidCodeMapping] FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE [DOFR].[GetAidCodeMapping];
